citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15pm on 22-JAN-
21. The contact was reached via email and stated that no one would be available at that time for an inspection.
End Section
